\w My|strong="H5060"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w refuses|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3985"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w loathsome|strong="H1741"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H3985"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

But \w my|strong="H5674"\w* brothers are \w as|strong="H3644"\w* faithless \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w wadis|strong="H5158"\w*, \w as|strong="H3644"\w* seasonal \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* \w that|strong="H5158"\w* \w overflow|strong="H5674"\w*,

Caravans turn \w aside|strong="H3943"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* \w routes|strong="H1870"\w*; \w they|strong="H1870"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w wasteland|strong="H8414"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* perish.

\w The|strong="H5027"\w* caravans \w of|strong="H1979"\w* \w Tema|strong="H8485"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w for|strong="H6960"\w* water; \w the|strong="H5027"\w* \w travelers|strong="H1979"\w* \w of|strong="H1979"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w hope|strong="H6960"\w* \w to|strong="H5027"\w* find it.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* are \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* hoped; \w their|strong="H3588"\w* arrival brings disappointment.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w help|strong="H1961"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w terror|strong="H2866"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* ever said, ‘\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w* something; \w offer|strong="H7809"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H7809"\w* \w from|strong="H3581"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3581"\w*;
